data.message: When creating premium fintech/investment platform mockups, mesh gradients (overlapping radial gradients in purple #6366F1, teal #00D4AA, pink #EC4899) combined with glassmorphism (backdrop-blur + semi-transparent fills like #FFFFFF08) create depth and sophistication. Use massive typography (96px headlines) with Source Serif 4 for authority, and bento grid layouts for features. Dark backgrounds (#050810) make accent colors pop.
